alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:29PM CDT until August 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... North central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Flomaton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brewton, Century, Flomaton, East Brewton, Jay, Pollard, Riverview, and Bratt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
